column4: I'm trying to create a deb... can anyone advise me on what to put in "version" for the control file... It seems to want a x.x.x-x style one, but the application is just released as 2002, 2006, 2008 and so on (maybe with revision numbers too),,,?
Syncing a pocketpc isnt easy on Ubuntu, dont try it unless you have lots of time
he didn't specify the type of PDA.
you may need to ask in ##linux
